channel.title: Ice barrage only working in wildy?
channel.description:
Why is my ice barrage only working in wild? i want to ice barrage npcs out if wild plz help.
~~eric

item.title: Ice barrage only working in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

those r thee only ice barrages in my client.

Read full topic
item.source: Ice barrage only working in wildy?

item.title: Ice barrage only working in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 40)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(539, 99, 10); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

item.title: Ice barrage only working in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

public void IceBarrage(){ if(icebar == 0){ inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 99, 10); actionTimer = 15; icebar = 10; PkingDelay = 15; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } }

so you only can use it in wildy delete those lines

~ supra
